author: clement
msg: Fix the issue Felix-637 about stack size error when a composite uses a long.
Update annotations to reflect changes about factory name computation (add the public_factory attribute).
Some cosmetic fixes too as well as tests on recent features.

author: bibryam
msg: Fix a bug in ViewRequest screen, reported by Roy in user list.

author: jeremias
msg: fonts package must not depend on the render package. Refactored to restore that rule.

author: mor
msg: Fix: Could not submit form for Step 2: Shipping - One Page Checkout, when a user type a full name of country/state in autocomplete because corresponding geo Id's were not being passed to the services called on form submit and hence resulting in an error on the panel. Many thanks to Rishi Solanki for provinding this patch and also thanks to Sumit Pandit for help on this issue.
